mapper.select: SELECT C.CIRCULAR_NO, C.CATEGORY_NO, C.CIRCULAR_TYPE_NO, C."TARGET", C.CREATE_BY, C.CREATE_DATE, C.TITLE, C."CONTENT", C.BEGIN_DATE, C.END_DATE, C.STATUS, C.UPDATE_BY, C.UPDATE_DATE, CG."CATEGORY", CT."TYPE", M."NAME", D."NAME" DE_NAME FROM CIRCULAR C JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = C.CREATE_BY JOIN CATEGORY CG ON C.CATEGORY_NO = CG.CATEGORY_NO JOIN CIR_TYPE CT ON C.CIRCULAR_TYPE_NO = CT.TYPE_NO LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.TARGET=D.DEPARTMENT_NO WHERE (TARGET=0 OR TARGET=#{departmentNo}) AND C.STATUS='Y'

SELECT C.CIRCULAR_NO, C.CATEGORY_NO, C.CIRCULAR_TYPE_NO, C."TARGET", C.CREATE_BY, C.CREATE_DATE, C.TITLE, C."CONTENT", C.BEGIN_DATE, C.END_DATE, C.STATUS, C.UPDATE_BY, C.UPDATE_DATE, CG."CATEGORY", CT."TYPE", M."NAME", D."NAME" DE_NAME FROM CIRCULAR C JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = C.CREATE_BY JOIN CATEGORY CG ON C.CATEGORY_NO = CG.CATEGORY_NO JOIN CIR_TYPE CT ON C.CIRCULAR_TYPE_NO = CT.TYPE_NO LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.TARGET=D.DEPARTMENT_NO WHERE C.CIRCULAR_NO=#{circularNo}

SELECT READING_NO, CIRCULAR_NO, R.MEMBER_NO, R."DATE", M."NAME", D."NAME" DE_NAME FROM READING R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO WHERE R.CIRCULAR_NO=#{circularNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO READING R (READING_NO, CIRCULAR_NO, MEMBER_NO, R."DATE") VALUES (SEQ_CIR_LIST.nextval, #{circularNo}, #{memberNo}, DEFAULT)
